Question: Novak once commented, "I believe I was put on this Earth to take care of this person.".
Hints: After Go ****, Young Go **** starred in Every Day's a Holiday (1937) for Paramount before their association came to an end.
This person made no public statements indicating that she had been married to Deiro.
NBC personally blamed this person for the incident and banned her (and the mention of her name) from their stations.
